headline: SSR Mining Stock Hits 52-Week High: What's Driving Its Performance?
summary: SSRM gains from the CC&V acquisition and solid mine productions. The rise in gold prices also boosts growth.

headline: Newmont Gains 28% YTD: How Should Investors Play the Stock?
summary: Declining earnings estimates, partly due to the concerns over elevated costs, cast a shadow over NEM's prospects.

headline: Newmont Corporation Sued for Securities Law Violations - Contact Levi & Korsinsky Before April 1, 2025 to Discuss Your Rights - NEM
summary: NEW YORK, March 21, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Levi & Korsinsky, LLP notifies investors in Newmont Corporation of a class action securities lawsuit. ...

headline: Mining M&A In 2024 - Gold Dominates M&A Space For 2nd Consecutive Year
summary: M&A activity in the metals and mining space strongly favored gold over base metals in 2024, but there was not any megamerger, like in 2023.

raw.headline: Mining M&A In 2024 - Gold Dominates M&A Space For 2nd Consecutive Year
